snippet.title: Detective Dotson trailer - It's a game and a show!
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2450840/Detective_Dotson/
A high stakes detective adventure set in modern day India!
Pixel art characters in a 3D and cinematic depiction of contemporary India
Detective Dotson is an animated series and game
